Name: Refined Bone Meal
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
Description2$english: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. Carefully regulated temperature ensures optimal nutrient preservation.

recipes.Name: Refined Bone Meal
recipes.Des: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. Carefully regulated temperature ensures optimal nutrient preservation.

NeedMaterial.Name: Coarse Horn
